markdownRemark.html:
In Windows OS

Current version v8.16.0

To upgrade to node 12: Visit https://nodejs.org/en/

And download the installer for windows (LTS) and install node.js using the installer

Also upgrade npm using npm-windows-upgrade npm package I upgraded to 6.12.1
